scripts.docker-laravel-5.6: docker run --link folium-mysql-test:folium-mysql-test --rm -v $(pwd):/code implementation-tests sh -c "cd /code && composer install && composer run laravel-5.6"
scripts.laravel-5.6: composer require --dev nesbot/carbon:1.25.* illuminate/database:5.6.* illuminate/log:5.6.* illuminate/http:5.6.* illuminate/validation:5.6.* illuminate/translation:5.6.*
scripts.laravel-5.7: composer require --dev nesbot/carbon:1.26.* illuminate/database:5.7.* illuminate/log:5.7.* illuminate/http:5.7.* illuminate/validation:5.7.* illuminate/translation:5.7.*
scripts.mysql: composer run mysql-run; composer run mysql-wait
scripts.mysql-run: docker run --name folium-mysql-test -e MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD=weltest -e MYSQL_DATABASE=dummy -e MYSQL_USER=dummy -e MYSQL_PASSWORD=dummy -p 3306:3306 -d mysql:5.7
scripts.mysql-wait: while ! docker exec folium-mysql-test sh -c "mysqladmin ping -uroot -pweltest -hlocalhost --silent"; do echo "Waiting for MySQL container..."; sleep 1; done
